name: scrape_data
description: Scrapes text content from a given HTML URL

url.description: The URL of the web page to scrape data from

name: create_validation_script
description: Creates a Python script using Pydantic to validate a JSON object based on a given data model

data_model.description: The data model for the JSON object to be validated

name: extract_data_model_from_url
description: Extracts a data model from a document located at a given URL. The function performs text extraction, document chunking, and further data processing to derive the data model.

doc_url.description: The URL of the document from which to extract the data model

name: read_pdf
description: Reads text content from PDF documents specified in a list of file paths. It opens each PDF, extracts text from all pages, and returns a list of extracted texts.

docs_paths.description: List of file paths to PDF documents
